reviews.review: yeet your opponents and you win

This game is decently hard with toxic players, hackers (if you don't play prime), and needs alot of skills to be very good at this game. Skills that you need is aim, hand-eye coordination, communications, if you're playing in competitive. CS:GO is very unique with their different spray patterns with each gun. It takes time to learn all the maps, spray patterns, pre-aim spots, grenade throws, map knowledge, crosshair placement, etc. Overall fun game but if you want to play this game you need to dedicate hours of playtime to get good.
